title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 112
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 112

State Regulations

Application For Hearing On

Adverse Ruling Relating To

Approval To Operate

Drug Abuse Treatment And/Or

Preventive Education Programs
TO: New York State Drug Abuse Control Commission

Albany, New York 12203
PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that in accordance with the provisions of

Chapter XXV of 14 NYCRR
2020.11
___________
(Voluntary Agency) hereby requests a hearing on the adverse
ruling issued in the name of the Commission, dated ________, and relating to
approval to operate a drug abuse treatment and/or preventive education
program. Dated: ________
____________
(Voluntary Agency)
____________
(Address)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app
112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
